data.actual_result: Two gifs appears and one plays automatically while the other gets triggered by hovering
data.expected_result: There should only be one gif that only plays when hovered over (normal behavour)
data.short_description: When editing a message if you have a gif avatar it will show it twice with one playing and the other not
data.steps_to_repro: - Have nitro avatar (transparent so you can see underneath) - send message - edit message
